channel.title: How Do I make People Into Mods?
channel.description: Just Wondering how to make people ino mods thanks.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 29, 2006, 05:24:01 AM[/size][hr]anyone know?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 29, 2006, 05:27:20 AM[/size][hr]=]

item.title: How Do I make People Into Mods?
item.dc:creator: @HelpmePl0x HelpmePl0x
item.description:
@HelpmePl0x wrote:

Sheesh, Its not hard, please learn at least basic coding before you or your friend makes a server.

Client.java
Search for Admin
Keep searching till it says something like 1=pmod 2=staff 3=admin/owner
Then where it says equalsignorecase “Whatever” Change Whatever to your name
[br][size=1]Posted at: October 29, 2006, 06:38:59 AM[/size][hr]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,27752.0.html

Heres a TUT if you still don’t understand…

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I make People Into Mods?
